title: [Large-Scale] Simulation Game-Based Construction Management Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational civil engineering knowledge (process management, cost estimation, material management, etc.)
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment in a BYOD environment, utilizing VR simulations and real-time data analysis tools for collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% proficiency in constructing construction project schedules and performing critical path analysis
Through simulation games, learners can establish resource optimization strategies for materials and labor within a 10% budget constraint
In a VR environment, learners can implement over 90% of a safety management plan during a 30m-scale dam construction simulation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
